title: MANIT Bhopal Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Technical Assistance Post
description: The Maulana Azad National Institute of Technology (MANIT Bhopal) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Technical Assistance Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech., B.Sc can grab this chance and apply for the MANIT Bhopal Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts are mentioned below. Interested and eligible candidates ...
